entry.string: What is it?

The Modules Module determines which modules are available on your Xaraya installation by controlling the install, upgrade, and removal of modules. The Modules Module also provides options to add further functionality in these modules through management of module hook configurations.
entry.translation: Das Module-Modul ist verantwortlich für die Installation, das Upgraden und das Entfernen von Modulen. Sie konnen damit festlegen, welche Module auf Ihrer Installation zur Verfügung stehen. Das Module-Modul bietet außerdem die Möglichkeit, Modulen erweiterte Funktionalitäten zur Verfügung zu stellen, da es die Konfiguration von Verbindungen (Hooks) steuert.

entry.string: How to use it?
From the menu, you have two choices:
entry.translation: Das Menü bietet Ihnen zwei Möglichkeiten:

entry.string: View All: Allows you to see what modules are currently installed on your system, and the current state that they are in.
entry.translation: Alle anzeigen: Zeigt die aktuell auf Ihrem System installierten Module und den Status, in dem sie sich gegenwärtig befinden.

entry.string: Configure Hooks: Allows you to add extra functionality to modules by configuring hooks from one module to another. For example, setting a hook to display comments (the Comments module) in articles (Articles module).
entry.translation: Hooks konfigurieren: Erlaubt Ihnen, Module mit Etxrafunktionalitäten auszustatten, indem Sie Hooks von einem Modul einem anderen zuordnen. Zum Beispiel können Sie die Kommentaranzeige (des Kommentarmoduls) den Beiträgen (Beitragsmodul) per Hook zuordnen.

entry.string: Modify Config: Change configuration options related to the Modules module, or modules in general.

The View All option at default setup displays a list of all modules that are available, but not necessarily active and installed in your Xaraya installation. All valid Xaraya modules found in your Xaraya modules directory should be listed here.
You can add more modules to this list at any time by adding them to your Xaraya modules directory and clicking the Reload button

Modules must be installed and active to be available for use on your Xaraya site. You may also need to setup the appropriate privileges for your users to view or use the module (See Privileges module and Roles module).
You must check to ensure any modules in upgrade status are upgraded and set to active in order to use them
You cannot uninstall or deactivate core modules
entry.translation: Sie können keine Core-Module entfernen oder deaktivieren

entry.string: There are a number of options with drop down selection lists that you should check when displaying your modules.
Style: Configures the interface style for display of modules.
View: Changes the current modules view. By default ALL modules are displayed.
entry.translation: Anzeigen: Ändert die aktuelle Moduleanzeige. Standardmäßig werden ALLE Module angezeigt.

entry.string: Sort By: This is the sort order for the module list.
entry.translation: Sortiert nach: Dies ist die Sortierreihenfolge für die Modulliste.

entry.string: Hide: Check this to hide core modules.
entry.translation: Verbergen: Dies auswählen, um die Core-Module zu verbergen.

entry.string: Within the view itself we have the following headers.
Name: The module name.
Version: The module version number.
Info: Some basic module information.
Status: The current status of the module.
Actions: Displays the actions available to you for this module
entry.translation: Aktionen: Zeigt die Ihnen zur Verfügung stehenden Aktionen für das entsprechende Modul an

entry.string: Properties: Provides a link that allows you to alter the module display in the User or Admin menu

Hooks: This provides an alternative means for setting hooks from other modules to on or off. If you do not understand this setting, please use the 'Configuring Hooks' settings below to configure and set functionality with hooks.
This menu link displays the Module Hooks Configuration page. Each of the installed and active modules here can provide additional functionality in other modules through the use of 'hooks'.
Important
To use the hook functionality provided by a module, click on the module that provides the hook, and then check the checkbox next to the module where you want to add that hook functionality.

As an example, if you wish to provide comments in articles, you need to activate the comments hook provided by the Comments module and allow that for the articles module. Comments module provides the hook so click on Comments, then check the checkbox next to the Article module, or one of the Articles module itemtypes to display the output of the comments hook in that module or itemtype.
entry.translation: Das Hook-Modul auswählen, das zusätzliche Funktionalität unterstützt, und dann die Module kennzeichnen, die davon Gebrauch machen sollen. (Z.B. "Kommentare" auswählen und dann "Artikel" auswählen, um Kommentare im Artikle-Modul zu ermöglichen)

entry.string: Taking the Comments module as an example, if you click on Comments and then browse the list you'll see you have the following options for each module where you may wish to hook and activate Comments:
Do NOT enable Comments functionality in [module name]
Enable the Comments hooks for ALL items in [module name]
entry.translation: Den Kommentar-Hook für ALLE Elemente aktivieren in [Modulname]

entry.string: Enable Comments functionality for SOME itemtypes in [module name]
entry.translation: Den Kommentar-Hook für EINIGE Elemente aktivieren in [Modulname]

entry.string: The last option allows you to activate the hook and display Comments in say News or Reviews, but not Documents for example.
entry.translation: Die letzte Option eröffnet Ihnen die Möglichkeit, den Hook zu aktivieren und damit Kommenatre anzuzeigen zum Beispiel in Nachrichtenbeiträgen oder Besprechungen, nicht jedoch bei Dokumentationen.

entry.string: Included Blocks
The Modules Module has no blocks included at this time.
Included Hooks
The Modules Module has no hooks included at this time.
Included Dynamic Data Properties
For developers, the Dynamic Module property is included and provides a drop down selection list of available Modules.
Further Information
Further information on the Modules module can be found at
Modules Module Extension page at
Modules Module - Xaraya Extension 36
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Modules module found at
Related documentation on Modules
Xaraya Documentation.
Modules Module Overview
